title: Name these fonts?
content:
I’ve found a couple of fonts surfing the net - would be great to find out what they are?

 [‹ Futuristic font from "The world of Lamborghini" video podcasts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194114/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41268 "Go to previous forum topic") [Type ID Request ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194114/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41351 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Jenny Phillips

comments.content:
So, you’ve found some fonts surfing the net. Aha.  
It would be great to see something in order to find out what they are.

Oops failed to upload pics! The fonts on these web pages...

“thewinemonger”  
 [http://www.thewinemonger.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194114/http:/www.thewinemonger.com/ "http://www.thewinemonger.com/")

“Daniel Eatock”  
 [http://www.kemistrygallery.co.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194114/http:/www.kemistrygallery.co.uk/ "http://www.kemistrygallery.co.uk/")

“Survival”  
 [http://www.scienceof.com/?lid=283](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194114/http:/www.scienceof.com/?lid=283 "http://www.scienceof.com/?lid=283")
